title: David Amess: What We Know About the Deadly Stabbing of the British Lawmaker
sub_head: Conservative member of the British Parliament was killed during a visit with constituents outside London
body:
An attacker killed a Conservative member of the British Parliament on Friday during the lawmaker’s visit with constituents in his district just outside London.
David Amess, a member of Prime Minister Boris Johnson‘s ruling Conservative Party, was fatally stabbed Friday during a meeting with constituents in his district in Essex, northeast of London. His office said he was stabbed numerous times. Essex police said they were called to an address in Leigh-on-Sea shortly after midday. Paramedics tried to save the wounded lawmaker, but the 69-year-old died at the scene.
